dimension: 34 1/2 x 29 in. (87.63 x 73.66 cm) (including top fringe)
title: Ceremonial cloth (tampan)
description: tan fabric ground; rust-colored central weaving on large bird with a small blue bird at the center of its stomach; three animals on boat-barge at bottom; two birds with human figures on back of large bird; blue, rust and golden brown end bands
creditline: Gift of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg and Robert T. Coffland
